page.title: 08EDUCATION IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: The{Rising Fives}started in 1982. There are 24 children.It runs from 9.15a.m. to 12 noon.There are 4 teachers who are paid and 2 volunteers.There is also{Wayfinders for mums and children. There are 132 children in the{Infant school.26 is the average number of children in each class.The school was founded in 1978.There are 7 classrooms 2 offices, 1 hall and 1 staffroom. There is a sponsored obstacle course every year.School starts at 9.00a.m. and finishes at 3.15p.m. There are 235 children in the{Junior school.The average number of children in each class is 30. 3 children have free meals.The school was built in 1977.It has been open 8 years.School starts at 8.55a.m. and finishes at 3.45p.m. The Holton-le-Clay Community Association is attached to the school.
